com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget

Class DynamicCollapsingToolbarLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • CollapsingToolbarLayout
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.widget.DynamicCollapsingToolbarLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseWidget, DynamicRtlWidget

    public class DynamicCollapsingToolbarLayout
extends CollapsingToolbarLayout
implements BaseWidget, DynamicRtlWidget
    A CollapsingToolbarLayout to provide support for Right to Left (RTL) layouts.
